attributes.action: Legislate for local Councillors to issue Fixed Penalty Parking Tickets in their own wards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police are unable to cope with illegally parked vehicles causing obstruction and dangerous situations across the country. Local Councillors who should be aware of these situations within their own wards could be permitted to issue fixed penalty parking tickets to alleviate the problems,and to free up the police for more serious crimes.
